lead_paragraph: A report in the Sports Briefing column on Wednesday about the Rangers’ decision to let forward Nikolai Zherdev become an unrestricted free agent described his draft history incorrectly. He is a former first-round draft pick, not a former No. 1 selection. (He was chosen fourth in the 2003 N.H.L. draft.).
